verses.text: \w A|strong="H3068"\w* psalm \w on|strong="H3068"\w* Solomon.

\w Give|strong="H5186"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* king thy judgment, \w O|strong="H0241"\w* \w God|strong="H0413"\w*: \w and|strong="H6666"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* kingâ€™s son thy \w justice|strong="H6666"\w*: \w To|strong="H0413"\w* judge thy people \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w justice|strong="H6666"\w*, \w and|strong="H6666"\w* thy poor \w with|strong="H0413"\w* judgment.

\w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* mountains \w receive|strong="H1961"\w* peace \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* people: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* hills justice.

\w He|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* judge \w the|strong="H3027"\w* poor \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w people|strong="H7563"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* save \w the|strong="H3027"\w* children \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* poor: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* humble \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w oppressor|strong="H2556"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0859"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* shall continue \w with|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* sun, \w and|strong="H0859"\w* before \w the|strong="H3588"\w* moon, throughout all generations.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H0517"\w* come \w down|strong="H5921"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* rain \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fleece; \w and|strong="H8416"\w* \w as|strong="H0859"\w* showers falling gently \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth.

\w In|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* days shall justice spring \w up|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H5797"\w* abundance \w of|strong="H7227"\w* peace, till \w the|strong="H1961"\w* moon \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H1961"\w* sway.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* rule \w from|strong="H3117"\w* sea \w to|strong="H3117"\w* sea, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* river unto \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ends \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth.

Before \w him|strong="H7993"\w* \w the|strong="H6256"\w* Ethiopians shall fall \w down|strong="H7993"\w*: \w and|strong="H6256"\w* \w his|strong="H7993"\w* enemies shall lick \w the|strong="H6256"\w* ground.

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* kings \w of|strong="H5315"\w* Tharsis \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* islands \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* offer presents: \w the|strong="H0559"\w* kings \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Arabians \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H5315"\w* Saba \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* bring gifts:

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w all|strong="H5337"\w* kings \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* earth \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* adore \w him|strong="H7291"\w*: \w all|strong="H5337"\w* nations \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* serve \w him|strong="H7291"\w*.

\w For|strong="H0430"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* shall deliver \w the|strong="H4480"\w* poor \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w mighty|strong="H0430"\w*: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* needy \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w had|strong="H0430"\w* \w no|strong="H0408"\w* helper.

He \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* spare \w the|strong="H1245"\w* poor \w and|strong="H0954"\w* needy: \w and|strong="H0954"\w* he \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w save|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H1245"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H1245"\w* poor.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H0589"\w* redeem \w their|strong="H3605"\w* souls \w from|strong="H5921"\w* usuries \w and|strong="H3254"\w* iniquity: \w and|strong="H3254"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* names \w shall|strong="H0589"\w* \w be|strong="H3254"\w* honourable \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* sight.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w live|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* given \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* gold \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Arabia, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w always|strong="H3117"\w* adore: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* bless \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* there \w shall|strong="H0905"\w* \w be|strong="H0136"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* firmament \w on|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* earth \w on|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* tops \w of|strong="H0905"\w* mountains, above Libanus \w shall|strong="H0905"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* fruit thereof \w be|strong="H0136"\w* exalted: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H0905"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* city \w shall|strong="H0905"\w* flourish like \w the|strong="H3069"\w* grass \w of|strong="H0905"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* earth.

\w Let|strong="H5046"\w* \w his|strong="H5046"\w* name \w be|strong="H0430"\w* blessed \w for|strong="H0430"\w* evermore: \w his|strong="H5046"\w* name continueth \w before|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* sun. \w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w* shall \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* tribes \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* earth \w be|strong="H0430"\w* blessed: \w all|strong="H5704"\w* nations shall magnify \w him|strong="H5046"\w*.

Blessed \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Israel, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* alone doth wonderful \w things|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* blessed \w be|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* name \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* majesty \w for|strong="H0430"\w* \w ever|strong="H4310"\w*: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* whole earth \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* filled \w with|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* majesty. \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* \w it|strong="H5704"\w*. \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* \w it|strong="H5704"\w*.
\w The|strong="H0834"\w* praises \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w David|strong="H5927"\w*, \w the|strong="H0834"\w* son \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Jesse, \w are|strong="H0834"\w* ended.
